CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Category__c , "Referrer Customer (Brand Ambassador)") , "A", IF( ISPICKVAL( Category__c , "Customer") , "B", IF( ISPICKVAL( Category__c , "Defaulter") ,"D","N") ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Grades the Contact based on their Category
CustomField.label: Category Grading
